p.s: The German girl Bianca L. volunteered in an Education Center for children, in a slum of Delhi.
Her main task was to teach the boys from 10:30 by the latest 12 amante meridiem and the girls from 2 pmpost meridiem to 4 pmpost meridiem.
She loved the kids since she first met them, because they are full of love, acceptance and interest in other people lives and experience.
But they also love their own lifeslives and pleasure to start the next day even if their fate is that bad.
They laugh, smile but also are tired and frustrated.
